original_text: The integration must allow developers to write and test GraphQL queries seamlessly within markdown blocks.
units: The integration must allow developers to write and test GraphQL queries seamlessly within markdown blocks .
GraphQL queries seamlessly within markdown blocks

original_text: This feature will improve DX when documenting APIs that use GraphQL by enabling inline query testing and formatting.
